### Published

```{r, echo = F, message=F, warning=F}
## GET YOUR PUB LIST

# library -----------------------------------------------------------------

rm(list = ls())
pacman::p_load(tidyverse,
               scholar,
               reactable,
               reactablefmtr)

# data --------------------------------------------------------------------

## your google id - can be found in the link bar of your google scholar page
sid <- "H9OuCKsAAAAJ"
lab <- c("S Kim", "JF Pomeranz", "A Terui")

## get publication list
pubs <- get_publications(sid) %>% 
  as_tibble() %>% 
  arrange(desc(year)) %>% 
  mutate(author = str_replace(author, "SM Shin-ichiro", "SS Matsuzaki"),
         ID = row_number()) %>% 
  select(ID, title, author, journal, year, cites) %>%
  rename_with(.fn = str_to_sentence)

pubs %>% 
  reactable(searchable = TRUE,
            pagination = FALSE,
            columns = list(
              Cites = colDef(
               cell = data_bars(pubs,
                                text_position = "outside-base",
                                fill_color = viridis::viridis(5))
               )
              )
            )
```
